member.name: T:DigitReplacement.Program
member.summary:
This is the main driver class.
Problem: digitDegree is all about taking the number of digits required in a number and finding out how many digits are required to turn a multi-digit number into a single digit number.

member.name: M:DigitReplacement.Program.DigitDegree(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method which finds out the number of digits required to turn a multi-digit number into a single digit number.
